title: Chasuble, 18th century
medium:
Medium: silk, metallic threads, linen
Technique: embroidered in couching and satin stitches
description: Chasuble of white silk entirely covered with embroidery in gold and silver metallic threads and multi-colored silk floss, backed with white linen and lined with red silk. Background of couched silver, with ornamental foliage in couched gold thread and naturalistic flowers in colored silk floss.

exhibitions.title: The Cooper-Hewitt Collections: A Design Resource

tombstone.epitaph:
Chasuble, 18th century.
18th century. Medium: silk, metallic threads, linen
Technique: embroidered in couching and satin stitches. Gift of George A. Hearn. 1907-14-1.
